name: Rules
text:
The corporation may adopt rules pursuant to chapter 91 necessary or desirable for the purpose of this part. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2]
    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The administration may adopt rules pursuant to chapter 91 necessary or desirable for the purpose of this part. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
Note
  Effective July 1, 2008, this section is repealed and functions are transferred to the department of education.  L 2005, c 204, §§3, 4.
